Functions for declaring layout and tabulatioin

Generate Rows Analyzing Different Variables Across Columns

add_analyzed_vars()

Generate Rows Analyzing Variables Across Columns

add_colby_multivar()

add_colby_varlevels()

Declaring a column-split based on levels of a variable

add_colby_varwbline()

Declaring a column-split with a Baseline level

add_colcounts()

Add the column population counts to the header

add_rowby_varlevels()

Add Rows according to levels of a variable

add_summary_count()

Add a content row of summary counts

build_table()

Create a table from a layout and data

manual_cols()

Utility functions

lstwrap()

Returns a function that coerces the return values of f to a list

Manual Table Creation Functions

These are the main functions needed to build an rtable.

rtable() rtablel()

Create a Table

rrow()

row

rcell()

Rcell

rheader()

Create a header

rrowl()

rrowl

Cell Formatting related Functions

cell formatting.

sprintf_format()

Specify a rcell format based on sprintf formattig rules

format_rcell()

Convert the contets of an rcell to a string using the format information

list_rcell_format_labels()

List with valid rcell formats labels grouped by 1d and 2d

Accessor and Modification Functions

Access and Modify Functions

names(<rtable>)

Get content of first header row of an rtable object

`row.names<-`(<rtable>)

change row names of rtable

row.names(<rheader>)

Row names of an rheader object

row.names(<rtable>)

Row names of an rtable object

`[`(<rtable>)

Access rcells in an rtable

`[`(<rheader>)

access cell in rheader

dim(<rtable>)

Dimension of rtable object

rbind.rtable()

Stack rtable and rrow objects

rbindl_rtables()

Stack a list of rtables

combine_rrows()

Combines two lists of rrows to a list of rrows

cbind_rtables()

cbind two rtables

`header<-`() col_info()

export

dim(<rheader>)

Dimension of rtable object

header_add_N()

Add N=xx to header

indented_row.names()

Row names of an rtable object with spaces

indent()

Change indentation of all rrows in an rtable

unlist(<rtable>)

Unlist method for rtables

unlist(<rcell>)

Unlist method for rcell

unlist(<rrow>)

Unlist method for rrow

insert_rrow()

insert rrows at a specific location

is_empty_rtable()

If rtable is empty

is_non_empty_rtable()

Whether object is anon-empty rtable

is_rtable()

Whether object is an rtable

header_indent()

Return Indentation of Header Rows

`header_indent<-`()

Return Indentation of Header Rows

header_row.names()

Access Header Row Names

`header_row.names<-`()

Modify Header Row Names

Tabulation Functions

rtabulate is a framework to derive rtables

rtabulate()

Tabulation Methods

rtabulate(<data.frame>)

Split data.frame and apply functions

rtabulate(<factor>)

Tabulate Factors

rtabulate(<logical>)

Tabulate a logical vector

rtabulate(<numeric>)

Tabulate a numeric vector

col_by_to_matrix()

Converts col_by to matrix if needed (if it is a factor) Also handles case when it is of class by_all x can be NULL if col_by is not of class by_all returns transformed col_by as a matrix

col_by_to_factor()

Convert a col_by to a factor, works for factors and matrices

by_add_total()

Adds column to matrix that corresponds to taking all entries (column of all TRUE)

by_all()

Select all rows

by_combine()

Combine levels

by_hierarchical()

Hierarchical col_by

by_quartile()

Cut by quartiles

by_compare_subset()

Compare Subset to Current col_by Levels

by_drop_empty_cols()

Drop empty columns from matrix-version of by

by_factor_to_matrix()

Convert a factor to a matrix by, each column corresponding to a factor level

Table sorting functions

funtions to sort rows within tables and list of tables

order_rrows()

Sort rrows in rtable

sort_rrows()

Sort Rows in rtable

order_rtables()

Order of rtables in a list

sort_rtables()

Sort rtables within a list

Output Functions

These functions create ascii or html representations of the table

toString.rtable()

Convert an rtable to ascii

toString.empty_rtable()

convert an empty old_rtable to a string

as_html()

Convert an rtable object to an shiny.tag html representation of the rtable

as_html(<default>)

Generic for as_html

as_html(<rtable>)

Convert an rtable object to html

Coercion Functions

coercion functions

as.rtable()

Convert an object to an rtable object

as.rtable(<table>)

Convert a table object to an rtable

Utility Functions

utility functions

Viewer()

Dispaly an rtable object in the Viewer pane in RStudio or in a browser

compare_rtables()

Corpare two rtables

label()

Get label attribute

`var_labels<-`()

Set Label Attributes of All Variables in a data.frame

var_labels()

Get Label Attributes of Variables in a data.frame

var_labels_remove()

Remove Variable Labels of a data.frame

var_relabel()

Copy and Change Variable Labels of a data.frame

with_label()

Return an object with a label attribute
